snippet: Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew plans to call on overseas regulators to make their rules tougher. | Carl C. Icahn has a new platform to pressure Apple: the cover of Time magazine. | Jon Horvath’s memory failed him again during the trial of his...
abstract: Treasury Secretary Jacob J. Lew plans to call on overseas regulators to make their rules tougher. | Carl C. Icahn has a new platform to pressure Apple: the cover of Time magazine. | Jon Horvath’s memory failed him again during the trial of his former boss at SAC Capital Advisors. | General Motors plans to sell the last of its holdings in its onetime financing arm, Ally Financial.
